/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of gray and white. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene.

The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, adding to the urban atmosphere. In the distance, a few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. The image is a snapshot of city life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature and architecture that characterizes the city.
